es.ull.iis.simulation.core
Interface WorkItem

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<WorkItem>, Identifiable, Prioritizable
All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkItem, WorkItem
public interface WorkItem
extends java.lang.Comparable<WorkItem>, Prioritizable, Identifiable

A work item is an instance of an Element performing a SingleFlow.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

Method Summary
 Activity getActivity()
          Returns the activity being performed.
 int getArrivalOrder()
          Returns the order this item occupies among the rest of work items.
 long getArrivalTs()
          Returns the timestamp when this work item arrived to request the current single flow.
 Element getElement()
          Returns the element performing this single flow.
 ActivityWorkGroup getExecutionWG()
          Returns the workgroup which is used to perform this flow, or null if the flow has not been carried out.
 SingleFlow getFlow()
          Returns the single flow being performed.
 long getTimeLeft()
          Returns the time required to finish the current single flow (only for interruptible activities)
